00054 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00055 double CodeWordColor::MatchProbabilistic(Pixel* p, int frame, double t_cd, double alpha, double beta, int minAge) {
00056         int i_2 = (p->R*p->R+p->G*p->G+p->B*p->B); 
00057         int i = p->R+p->G+p->B;
00058         double d = (R*p->R+G*p->G+B*p->B);
00059         // color distortion
00060         double cd = sqrt(abs(i_2 - d*d/(R*R+G*G+B*B+1)));
00061         if (i > alpha*i_max && i < min(beta*i_max, i_min/alpha)) 
00062                 return 0;
00063         else if (cd > t_cd)
00064                 return 1;
00065         else
00066                 return cd/t_cd;
00067 }
00068 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00069 bool CodeWordColor::Match(Pixel* p, int frame, double t_cd, double alpha, double beta, int minAge) {
00070         int i_2 = (p->R*p->R+p->G*p->G+p->B*p->B); 
00071         int i = p->R+p->G+p->B;
00072         double d = (R*p->R+G*p->G+B*p->B);
00073         // color distortion
00074         if (abs(i_2 - d*d/(R*R+G*G+B*B+1)) > t_cd*t_cd) 
00075                 return false;
00076         
00077         // brightness distortion
00078         if (i < alpha*i_max || i > min(beta*i_max, i_min/alpha))
00079                 return false;
00080 
00081         return true;
00082 }
00083 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00084 void CodeWordColor::Update(Pixel* p, int frame) {               
00085         R = (age*R+p->R)/(age+1);
00086         G = (age*G+p->G)/(age+1);
00087         B = (age*B+p->B)/(age+1);
00088         i_min = min(p->R+p->G+p->B, i_min);
00089         i_max = max(p->R+p->G+p->B, i_max);
00090         age = age + 1;
00091         if (frame != -1) {
00092                 stale = max(stale, frame - last);
00093                 last = frame;
00094         }
00095 }
00096 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00097 void CodeWordColor::Serialize( CArchive& archive ) {
00098         CObject::Serialize( archive );
00099         if( archive.IsStoring() )
00100             archive << R << G << B << i_min << i_max << age << stale << first << last;
00101         else 
00102                 archive >> R >> G >> B >> i_min >> i_max >> age >> stale >> first >> last;
00103 }

00105 template <> void AFXAPI SerializeElements <CodeWordColor> ( CArchive& ar, CodeWordColor* p, INT_PTR nCount )
00106 {
